title: The Fiddlesticks Show, your favorite candy in action

embed.description: Expected the Candysticks, got the Fiddledicks... Music: Choco Island by Panman14 ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQedfsvdMAI Panic Restaurant ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQedfsvdMAI Super 3D Space Jam World 64 ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3RbXxG63IA Funfair Fever by Loeder ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-2iPWdEWaqQ Valley of Repose by Harmonica Fish ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0i-rOjLwMkU

body:
Hi Folks,
Today I would like to show you some love on the Candysticks ! Joy, fear, but mostly fails, you'll find a pure video of sweet evilness there, and my goal is to make you enjoy these in-game moments !
Now have a great time, and hope you'll not lose yourself in this video of chaos ! :D
See you guys !

replies.body:
I also rock the dark candy (since 2012), and although I only ARAM for the last few years, I used to main middlesticks (or jungle hec) when I still played rift.
Fiddles gave me my first penta ever (a solo 1v5) back in season 2 (I didn't play season 1), so I'll always <3 him.

The donger kill at about 2:15 is great.

WTF is riven doing at 3:30?

Editing was great, soundtrack was spot-on, A+ vid.

I used to play a lot Fiddlesticks in season 2 too, one of the first champ I played ! But never get my penta with him :P
Actually for Riven, I guess it was a bug of the camera, but still, I have no freaking idea ! Your words pleased me a lot, so thank you for this kind message !
